img_above_text:
![Snow Fox Questline \(57\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/49/Snow_Fox_Questline_%2857%29.png)
If you're having a hard time finding the right moment to attack, try getting him to stand still as often as possible by using Immobilize. We'd also recommend having Cloud Step equipped for this fight so you can match his dashing ability. Using Cloud Step will allow you to gain the upper hand on him at times and surprise him.
img_below_text:
The biggest attack he performs is one where he whips up a load of papers into a tornado that will follow you around the temple. You can dodge this or run away from it, but he'll use it as cover at times to get closer to you. Toward the end of this move, the papers will start to fall and there's an opening where he doesn't move much at all. This is the perfect moment to Immobolize him or dash over to attack as much as you can.
Any chance you get where you're able to make him stagger backward, keep attacking. When he appears to be losing his balance, he'll be slower to get back into his pattern of attacks and you can keep finishing combos and use your Focus points for heavier attacks.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Snow Fox Questline \(57\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/49/Snow_Fox_Questline_%2857%29.png)
If you're having a hard time finding the right moment to attack, try getting him to stand still as often as possible by using Immobilize. We'd also recommend having Cloud Step equipped for this fight so you can match his dashing ability. Using Cloud Step will allow you to gain the upper hand on him at times and surprise him."
        - Following Text: "The biggest attack he performs is one where he whips up a load of papers into a tornado that will follow you around the temple. You can dodge this or run away from it, but he'll use it as cover at times to get closer to you. Toward the end of this move, the papers will start to fall and there's an opening where he doesn't move much at all. This is the perfect moment to Immobolize him or dash over to attack as much as you can.
Any chance you get where you're able to make him stagger backward, keep attacking. When he appears to be losing his balance, he'll be slower to get back into his pattern of attacks and you can keep finishing combos and use your Focus points for heavier attacks."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character is engaged in a boss fight against an enemy named "Non-Void," who appears to be summoning a whirlwind of papers as part of an attack. The preceding and following text suggests strategies for this encounter, including using abilities like Immobilize and Cloud Step to counter the enemy's movements and exploit openings during its paper tornado attack. The health bar and action icons visible in the image further emphasize the tactical nature of the fight.
